thread.title: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 11: Akshay Kumar’s ‘Jolly LLB 2’ to enter 100 crore club soon
thread.title_full: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 11: Akshay Kumar’s ‘Jolly LLB 2’ to enter 100 crore club soon

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 11: Akshay Kumar’s ‘Jolly LLB 2’ to enter 100 crore club soon
text:
Akshay Kumar's 'Jolly LLB 2' is running in its second week now. The Subhash Kapoor film earned Rs 2.25 crore on Monday (Day 11) taking its total to Rs 90.75 crore, as reported by Boxofficeindia.com. The Akshay Kumar and Huma Qureshi starrer had collected Rs 72.98 crore in its first week and Rs 17.75 crore in its second weekend.
According to the producers of 'Jolly LLB 2', the film collected Rs 2.48 crore on day 11 taking its total collection to Rs 97.92 crore.
The film that is a satire on the Indian legal system is expected to enter the 100 crore club soon. Huma Qureshi features as the leading lady opposite Akshay while Saurabh Shukla plays the judge and Annu Kapoor the rival lawyer in 'Jolly LLB 2'.
